icloud.title: iCloud & Data
icloud.backup_footer: Your subscription data will be securely synced across all your devices via iCloud Drive.
icloud.delete_all_confirm_message: This action permanently deletes all data from your device. If iCloud sync is enabled, data will also be removed from iCloud.
icloud.delete_all_footer: This action permanently deletes all data from your device. If iCloud sync is enabled, data will also be removed from iCloud.
